about_the_game:
The game is developed by individual developers, if there are bugs or other problems in the game, please join the discussion group to give feedback, and I will adjust it as soon as possible. Thanks for the support.

This is a social reasoning game, you and your companions lurking in the evil forces, find your correct partner, in the mysterious maze, complete the task together, escape the maze!

Game Play

Play online with 5-16 players, compete for the Holy Grail, and complete game objectives together! Escape the mysterious maze together!

During the game, the "Holy Grail" will be generated in a random location in the maze, and the "Holy Grail" will be taken to the torch altar to open the voting task.
Each round of voting will have a specified number of voting players. Players of the forces of good are only allowed to vote "yes", while lurking players of the forces of evil can choose to vote "yes" or "no". Each round of voting has a limit on the number of "no votes" allowed, and if the "no votes" exceed the limit, the round is judged to have failed.
The number of specific failures in the whole game is limited, if the number of failures exceeds the limit, the evil forces players win, and the good forces players will be trapped in the maze forever......

If you are a force for good, then what you need to do is to gain the trust of other players and participate in the voting as much as possible to ensure the success of the voting.
If you are an evil force, then you have to deceive and win over people through your actions, make as many people as possible believe you, and then participate in the vote to make the mission fail.

Game Features

  • Players don't die in the game, allowing you to participate throughout the game.
  • The game adopts a fully random map generation method, which will automatically generate N*N plots randomly, ensuring that each game can bring unknown game experience
  • 6+ different plots, make the map random with more possibilities, and more plot types will be added in the future
  • 8+ different props to make you and your friends more fun
  • 15+ different classes, make the game more random, and the righteous forces have "fool" characters, they will make the good people's inference more confusing, increase the difficulty of reasoning
  • 16+ different characters for players to choose to play
